DOC.brief_title: Use Predictive Modeling Improve Operating Room Scheduling Efficiency
DOC.detailed_description: The goal propose study address efficacy schedule methodology use regression-based predictive modeling system ( PMS ) calculate operative anesthetic time length . The investigator hypothesize compare traditional scheduling system ( TSS ) calculate operative length use historic mean , case allocation operate room use PMS improve schedule precision , increase operative volume increase OS personnel satisfaction , without adverse impact patient outcomes . The investigator evaluate hypothesis use randomized block design two operating room single surgical specialty total 100 operative day per arm .
